title: Irene Liu
author: Irene Liu
description: Irene Liu on the 2023 30 Under 30 - Food & Drink - In 2020, Irene Liu cofounded Chiyo, a food delivery service focused on Eastern food therapy and nutritional
cleaned_text: About Irene Liu In 2020, Irene Liu cofounded Chiyo, a food delivery service focused on Eastern food therapy and nutritional science for each stage of motherhood. Growing up in a Taiwanese household, Liu learned early on that food can be medicinal, especially through traditional Chinese medicine healing foods. Chiyo's stage-specific meal programs reimagine food from fertility through postpartum. Says Liu, "I'm building against the clock for the care I want for myself, my family & friends. We're on a mission to raise the standard of maternal care." Education Master of Arts/Science, Harvard Kennedy School Bachelor of Arts/Science, University of California, Berkeley Master of Business Administration, University of Pennsylvania, Wharton
